title: New: Lulu James – Closer
body:
I was only re-listening to the now classic **Lulu James** jam, **Be Safe**, yesterday, gushing over everything about it.

Today we’re treated to a new single, the infectious _Closer_. Less of a slow jam and more disco inspired, the track is a much-needed move for **James** onto the dance floor. This girl is the future.

excerpt.full: I was only re-listening to the now classic Lulu James jam, Be Safe, yesterday, gushing over everything about it. Today we’re treated to a new single, the infectious Closer. Less of a slow jam and more disco inspired, the track is a much-needed move for James onto the dance floor. This girl is the future.
